Item ID12934

Zulrah's scales are items used to charge serpentine helmets, toxic blowpipes, toxic staves of the dead, and tridents of the swamp. It can also be used to create anti-venom at 87 Herblore by using them on an Antidote++, with 5 scales used per dose.

They are primarily obtained as a drop from Zulrah. They can also be obtained by dissecting sacred eels with a knife, which requires level 72 in Cooking. A player's Cooking level affects how many scales are received when they are dissected.

In addition, players can receive 20,000 scales from dismantling the following items:

  • Tanzanite fang
  • Toxic blowpipe (empty)
  • Serpentine visage
  • Serpentine helm (uncharged)
  • Magic fang

On average, each Zulrah kill will provide 220 scales, or 337 if including scales gained by dismantling the aforementioned drops.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Zulrah's scales have been the featured item on the Grand Exchange's official site since its release. They were finally replaced by the Santa hat on December 17th, 2018, but reverted shortly afterwards.
  • They are also the most traded Old School-exclusive items on the Grand Exchange.

[[File:Zulrah's scales detail.png|left|135px]]
'''Zulrah's scales''' are items used to charge [[serpentine helmet]]s, [[toxic blowpipe]]s, [[toxic staff of the dead|toxic staves of the dead]], and [[Trident of the swamp|tridents of the swamp]]. It can also be used to create [[anti-venom]] at 87 [[Herblore]] by using them on an [[Antidote++]], with 5 scales used per dose.

They are primarily obtained as a drop from [[Zulrah]]. They can also be obtained by dissecting [[sacred eel]]s with a [[knife]], which requires level 72 in [[Cooking]]. A player's Cooking level affects how many scales are received when they are dissected.

In addition, players can receive 20,000 scales from dismantling the following items:
*[[Tanzanite fang]]
*[[Toxic blowpipe (empty)]]
*[[Serpentine visage]]
*[[Serpentine helm (uncharged)]]
*[[Magic fang]]

On average, each Zulrah kill will provide 220 scales, or 337 if including scales gained by dismantling the aforementioned drops.

==Trivia==
* Zulrah's scales have been the featured item on the [http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_oldschool/ Grand Exchange's official site] since its release. They were finally replaced by the [[Santa hat]] on December 17th, 2018, but reverted shortly afterwards.
* They are also the most traded Old School-exclusive items on the Grand Exchange.
